title.native: くまクマ熊ベアーぱーんち！

description:
The second season of Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear.

Yuna finds new friends and adventures in the world of her favorite MMO!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description:
__[Profile (F.M.F Corporation)](http://www.fmf-music.com/creators2.html#id69)__ | __[Blog (JP)](http://sk55.seesaa.net/)__

__Birthplace:__ Takayama City, Gifu Prefecture, Japan
__Favorite Artists:__ Brian Eno, Coldcut, Miles Davis

__Shigeo Komori__ is a Japanese keyboardist, music producer, composer and arranger.

__Hobbies:__ Games, eating, tennis, swimming

[Website](https://columbia.jp/wakiazumi) | [Talent Page](https://haikyo.co.jp/profile/profile.php?ActorID=12722) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/azumi_waki) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ajujustaff) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/azumi_waki)

On August 10, 2023, she announced on Twitter her marriage to her longtime partner met through a shared hobby of gaming.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
~!
• Charlotte (Genshin Impact)
 • Mem (Honkai: Star rail)!~
